judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Affirmed.
Mr. Justice Roberts would reverse because of the authority’s failure to comply with a rule of the court below.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Norman Seidel, with him Justin K. McCarthy and Daniel L. McCarthy, for appellants.
Alfred T. Williams, Jr., with him H. P. McFadden, and McFadden, Biskin & Williams, for redevelopment authority, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
King Appeal.
Argued April 29, 1965.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Norman Seidel, with him Justin K. McCarthy and Daniel L. McCarthy, for appellants.
Alfred T. Williams, Jr., with him H. P. McFadden, and McFadden, Biskin & Williams, for redevelopment authority, appellee.
May 27, 1965:
